scripts.postinstall: npm run login && npm run setup && npm run init
scripts.login: (node -e "import fs from 'fs'; process.exit(fs.existsSync('.auth') ? 1 : 0);" && devvit login --copy-paste && touch .auth) || true
scripts.init: (node -e "import fs from 'fs'; process.exit(fs.existsSync('.initialized') ? 1 : 0);" && npm run deploy) || true
